zh-cn: 菲德尔·亚历杭德罗·卡斯特罗·鲁斯

description.zh-cn: 古巴政治家、军事家、革命家，古巴革命领袖，古巴共产党、社会主义古巴和古巴革命武装力量的主要缔造者。
description.en: A Cuban politician, military leader, and revolutionary who was the leader of the Cuban Revolution and a primary founder of the Communist Party of Cuba, socialist Cuba, and the Cuban Revolutionary Armed Forces.

description.zh-cn: 古巴政治家，菲德尔·卡斯特罗的弟弟，曾任古巴共产党中央委员会第一书记、古巴国务委员会主席等职务。
description.en: Cuban politician, brother of Fidel Castro, who served as the First Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba and President of the Council of State of Cuba.

description.zh-cn: 阿根廷马克思主义革命家，古巴革命的核心人物之一。
description.en: An Argentine Marxist revolutionary and a major figure of the Cuban Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 古巴独裁者，其政权于1959年被菲德尔·卡斯特罗领导的古巴革命推翻。
description.en: Cuban dictator whose regime was overthrown by the Cuban Revolution led by Fidel Castro in 1959.

description.zh-cn: 古巴政治家，曾任古巴总统。
description.en: Cuban politician who served as President of Cuba.

description.zh-cn: 菲德尔·卡斯特罗的父亲。
description.en: Father of Fidel Castro.

description.zh-cn: 菲德尔·卡斯特罗的第一任妻子。
description.en: First wife of Fidel Castro.

description.zh-cn: 菲德尔·卡斯特罗的第二任妻子。
description.en: Second wife of Fidel Castro.

nodes.id: 纳塔莉亚·雷韦尔塔·克鲁斯

zh-cn: 纳塔莉亚·雷韦尔塔·克鲁斯

description.zh-cn: 古巴社会名流，曾是菲德尔·卡斯特罗的情人。
description.en: Cuban socialite who was a lover of Fidel Castro.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人。
description.en: A key founder and leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于加勒比海的社会主义国家。
description.en: A socialist state in the Caribbean Sea.

description.zh-cn: 古巴的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party in Cuba.

description.zh-cn: 古巴的国家权力机构。
description.en: A state body of Cuba.

description.zh-cn: 古巴的最高行政机关。
description.en: The highest executive body in Cuba.

description.zh-cn: 由菲德尔·卡斯特罗领导的革命组织，旨在推翻古巴独裁者富尔亨西奥·巴蒂斯塔。
description.en: A revolutionary organization led by Fidel Castro to overthrow the Cuban dictator Fulgencio Batista.

description.zh-cn: 古巴共和国的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces of the Republic of Cuba.

description.zh-cn: 位于古巴哈瓦那的一所公立大学。
description.en: A public university located in Havana, Cuba.

nodes.id: 伯利恒耶稣会预备学校

zh-cn: 伯利恒耶稣会预备学校

description.zh-cn: 古巴的一个民粹主义政党，菲德尔·卡斯特罗早年曾加入该党。
description.en: A Cuban populist political party that Fidel Castro joined in his early years.

description.zh-cn: 北美洲的联邦共和国。
description.en: A federal republic in North America.

description.zh-cn: 1922年至1991年间存在的欧亚大陆社会主义国家。
description.en: A socialist state in Eurasia that existed from 1922 to 1991.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia.

description.zh-cn: 美国联邦政府的主要情报机构之一。
description.en: One of the principal intelligence agencies of the federal government of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 由菲德尔·卡斯特罗领导的武装起义，最终推翻了富尔亨西奥·巴蒂斯塔的独裁统治。
description.en: An armed revolt led by Fidel Castro that ultimately overthrew the dictatorship of Fulgencio Batista.

description.zh-cn: 1961年由美国中央情报局支持的古巴流亡分子在古巴西南海岸猪湾发起的一次失败的军事入侵。
description.en: A failed military invasion of Cuba undertaken by CIA-sponsored Cuban exiles in April 1961, on the southwestern coast of Cuba at the Bay of Pigs.

nodes.id: 暗杀菲德尔·卡斯特罗事件

zh-cn: 暗杀菲德尔·卡斯特罗事件

description.zh-cn: 指美国中央情报局等机构针对菲德尔·卡斯特罗策划的一系列暗杀行动，据称共计638次。
description.en: Refers to a series of assassination plots against Fidel Castro, reportedly totaling 638, primarily orchestrated by the U.S. Central Intelligence Agency.

description.zh-cn: 古巴奥尔金省的一个村庄，是菲德尔·卡斯特罗的出生地。
description.en: A village in Holguín Province, Cuba, and the birthplace of Fidel Castro.

description.zh-cn: 古巴的首都和最大城市。
description.en: The capital and largest city of Cuba.

position.en: First Secretary of the Central Committee

relationships.target: 伯利恒耶稣会预备学校

description.zh-cn: 关系以离婚告终。
description.en: The relationship ended in divorce.

relationships.target: 纳塔莉亚·雷韦尔塔·克鲁斯

description.zh-cn: 劳尔·卡斯特罗长期担任菲德尔·卡斯特罗的副手，任古巴共产党中央委员会第二书记、国务委员会第一副主席等职，并最终接替其职务。
description.en: Raúl Castro long served as Fidel Castro's deputy, holding positions such as Second Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba and First Vice President of the Council of State, eventually succeeding him.

description.zh-cn: 菲德尔·卡斯特罗是社会主义古巴的主要缔造者。
description.en: Fidel Castro was a primary founder of socialist Cuba.

description.zh-cn: 切·格瓦拉在七二六运动和古巴革命中是菲德尔·卡斯特罗领导下的重要指挥官。
description.en: Che Guevara was a key commander under Fidel Castro's leadership during the 26th of July Movement and the Cuban Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 菲德尔·卡斯特罗是古巴革命的领袖。
description.en: Fidel Castro was the leader of the Cuban Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 古巴革命的胜利导致富尔亨西奥·巴蒂斯塔的独裁政权垮台。
description.en: The victory of the Cuban Revolution led to the collapse of Fulgencio Batista's dictatorship.

description.zh-cn: 美国中央情报局策划并支持了猪湾事件，试图推翻卡斯特罗政权。
description.en: The U.S. Central Intelligence Agency planned and supported the Bay of Pigs Invasion in an attempt to overthrow the Castro regime.

description.zh-cn: 菲德尔·卡斯特罗领导的古巴军队击败了入侵者，成功挫败了猪湾事件。
description.en: Cuban forces led by Fidel Castro defeated the invaders, successfully thwarting the Bay of Pigs Invasion.

description.zh-cn: 自1961年猪湾事件后，古巴与美国断绝双边关系，两国关系长期处于敌对状态。
description.en: After the Bay of Pigs Invasion in 1961, Cuba severed bilateral relations with the United States, and the two countries have long been in a state of hostility.

description.zh-cn: 在冷战期间，古巴与苏联建立了密切的政治和经济联系。
description.en: During the Cold War, Cuba established close political and economic ties with the Soviet Union.

relationships.target: 暗杀菲德尔·卡斯特罗事件

description.zh-cn: 中央情报局策划了一系列针对菲德尔·卡斯特罗的暗杀行动。
description.en: The CIA orchestrated a series of assassination attempts against Fidel Castro.

relationships.source: 暗杀菲德尔·卡斯特罗事件

description.zh-cn: 针对菲德尔·卡斯特罗的多次暗杀企图均未成功。
description.en: Multiple assassination attempts against Fidel Castro were unsuccessful.

description.zh-cn: 在中苏关系恶化时期，菲德尔·卡斯特罗曾公开嘲讽对毛泽东的个人崇拜。
description.en: During the Sino-Soviet split, Fidel Castro publicly mocked the personality cult surrounding Mao Zedong.
